name: ICA-AROMA_8Phys
description: Denoising strategy based on ICA-AROMA - method that automatically identifies and removes motion artifacts from fMRI data (Prium et al., 2015). Pipeline additionally regress out 8Phys - mean physiological signals from white matter (WM) and cerebrospinal fluid (CSF), their quadratic terms (Satterthwaite et al., 2013).
